description: This file is a React component for a homepage in a web application. It renders a landing page with a hero section, quick action cards, and a chat playground featuring a ChatInput component. It defines the Home component, including UI layout and interactions, as well as a reusable ActionCard component.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: React functional component serving as the homepage, rendering hero section, quick actions, and chat interface.

methods.name: ActionCard
methods.description: Reusable React component for displaying a clickable action card with title, description, and button.
